item.title: NSF GRFP Bootcamp scheduled to run August 4th through 25th
item.description: Date: Monday, August 4, 2025 12:00 AM - Mon , August 25, 2025 12:00 AM - Participants complete online modules on their own time. Develop strong application materials for this 3 year fellowship which provides a salary and tuition for graduate school. Feedback on documents available for all applicants. For more information email madige@rpi.edu. Register for the Bootcamp https://surveys.rpi.edu/jfe/form/SV_85M3eKII9idFy5M

item.title: Multiple Paving Projects, July 16th - August 6th
item.description: Please be advised that the Site Services Department will be overseeing multiple paving projects within the coming weeks. We will be repaving sidewalks in the following areas: Around the Rensselaer Student Union, West Lot, Albright Lot, all sidewalks surrounding Albright, Cook Drive from the circle in front of the Houston Field House to the intersection of Sunset Avenue and sidewalks between the buildings in Stacwyck.

item.title: Single Course Enrollment Options with Rensselaer at Work this Fall Term | Aug. 7
item.description: Date: Thursday, August 7, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., will host this Rensselaer at Work information session reviewing the online graduate programs for working professionals and provide course enrollment options to make an immediate impact on one’s work. Participants can also explore courses for developing valuable skills that benefit employee and employer alike. Please register to attend

item.description: The Apple Back-to-School Promotion is back! item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Leading from Anywhere” | Aug. 5
item.description: Date: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:30 AM - At Rensselaer, we maintain that “leadership” involves a learnable set of actions and behaviors that is available to everyone. Whether it be leading a particular project or initiative, assisting others in overcoming obstacles and capitalizing on opportunities, or catalyzing co-creation with colleagues. item.title: An Important Notice to All Instructors Regarding LMS Fall 2025 Course Requests
item.description:
All Rensselaer Learning Management System (Blackboard Learn SaaS) instructors, designers, and TAs who are planning on having an LMS course site for the Fall 2025 term should note that “Do submit” and “Do not submit” conditionals are still in place for submitting their course requests.
